law.text: A personal representative, after the expiration of two (2) years from the time he qualifies, shall be charged with interest on the surplus assets in his hands from that period, and before the expiration of two (2) years shall be charged with all interest realized on assets.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3859.
